nodes.bodyText: Lets add the missing @throws LocalGroupNotFoundException to javadoc.
Also DuplicateAccessRightException is missing. Perhaps add that too.
Is description actually required? Just wondering it doesn't sound mandatory.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -4583,6 +4591,27 @@ components:
           uniqueItems: true
           items:
             $ref: '#/components/schemas/GroupMember'
+    LocalGroupAdd: # ok
+      type: object
+      description: model for adding a new LocalGroup
+      required:
+        - code
+        - description

nodes.bodyText: It is required. It is also shown as the main identifier when e.g. searching for subjects (in the first column in the subjects table) -> guess it would be dull if it was just empty
nodes.diffHunk:
